name: That Time I Fell in a Cave
name_original: That Time I Fell in a Cave
description:
Oh joy of joys! Stormy has fallen into a cave while out hunting! How will she get out? And what trials will she face on her journey?

Battle your way through a vast cave filled with very unhappy bats. Hopefully find some good loot on this misadventure. Apparently drag your dog around while you're at it. At least he's one seriously good-natured pooch.

This short, quirky game was created for the RPGMaker One Map Challenge and can be completed in under 10 minutes. 

Game was created using RPGMaker MV.
